lead_paragraph: Brazilian authorities say that senior Olympic official Patrick Hickey has been released from prison on bail while a Summer Games ticket-scalping probe continues.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Releases Olympic Official on Bail, Probe Continues
headline.main: Brazil Releases Olympic Official on Bail, Probe Continues

snippet: Brazilian authorities say that senior Olympic official Patrick Hickey has been released from prison on bail while a Summer Games ticket-scalping probe continues....
